/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
